com.radirius.merc.util

Class TextureFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.merc.util.TextureFactory

  • public class TextureFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to get texture grids and strips from single files. It is more efficient to store all textures on one image than having multiple resources on different files

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextureFactory()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Texture[][] getTextureGrid(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi, int divwidth, int divheight)
      Parses from bi, dividing every divwidth and divheight.
      static Texture[][] getTextureGrid(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi, int divwidth, int divheight, boolean local_fliphor, boolean local_flipvert)
      Parses from bi, dividing every divwidth and divheight, flipping each subsection depending on local_fliphor horizontal, and local_flipvert vertical.

      • getTextureStripFromGrid

        public static Texture[] getTextureStripFromGrid(Texture[][] textures)
        Gets texture strip from a texture grid, reading left-right and down. Like a book; a bad@$$ book.
